title: How to learn flask
content: Learning Flask in 2024 is a rewardin journey that combines understanding Python fundamentals with mastering web development concepts. Start by ensuring you have a solid grasp of Python basics such as functions, classes, and modules, which you can learn through resources like Pythons official documentation or platforms like Codecademy. Once comfortable with Python, dive into Flask by exploring its official documentation and following beginner-friendly tutorials on platforms like Real Python or freeCodeCamp.
